version_description:
1. Access the best tasting keyboard ever with NEW McDonald’s stickers
2. Enhanced login that remembers those that revisit the app
3. Better Nutrition and ingredient navigation
4. Upgraded barcodes for easy scanning
Thank you for the continued feedback! In this update we squashed some bugs. More updates to come.

- Send tastier texts with our NEW McDonald's Keyboard
- Lots of bug fixes

- Send tastier texts with our NEW McDonald's Keyboard
- Lots of bug fixes

- Crash fixes
- Performance improvements

• Completely redesigned McDonald’s App
• Slide and scroll your way to savings
• Lots of bug fixes
• McDonald's Keyboard—now with new stickers!

• Lots of bug fixes. Thank you for your feedback...we are listening and improving!
• Resolved Log Out issues
• Slide and scroll your way to savings

• Lots of bug fixes. Thank you for your feedback...we are listening and improving!
• Resolved Log Out issues
• Slide and scroll your way to savings

- Crash fixes
- Thank you for your feedback…we are listening and improving!

· Mobile Ordering available in select markets
· Easier ways to connect to in restaurant WiFi
· Fix Login Issues
· McDonald’s Sticker Keyboard is back

· Mobile Ordering available in select markets
· Easier ways to connect to in restaurant WiFi
· Fix Login Issues
· McDonald’s Sticker Keyboard is back
Updated login page, bug fixes and performance enhancements
Bug fixes, performance enhancements, Xcode 8 and Swift 3.0 and Signature Crafted Event.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements
Coke at #McDonalds, bug fixes and performance enhancements
Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements

We heard you loud and clear!
. You can now add certain deals to your mobile order.
. Applicable promotional pricing will be automatically applied to your Mobile Orders when you check-in at a participating store. Terms and conditions apply.
. Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

We heard you loud and clear!
. You can now add certain deals to your mobile order.
. Applicable promotional pricing will be automatically applied to your Mobile Orders when you check-in at a participating store. Terms and conditions apply.
. Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

- Apple Pay is now available.
- Improved Mobile Ordering Customizations and Check Out.
- You can now add certain deals to your mobile order.
- Applicable promotional pricing will be automatically applied to your Mobile Orders when you check-in at a participating store. Terms and conditions apply.
- Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

- iPhone X support
- Improved check-in experience for Mobile Order and Pay
- Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements

- Adding Deals to Mobile Order & Pay is even easier
- Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements
Now order McDelivery through the app.

There’s a new look for your earned McCafé® Rewards, but the perk stays the same! Buy 5 any size McCafé® drinks, get 1 free.
Starting 2020, you can manage your privacy data & personal information under the Profile section in your app.
Various other bug fixes, ordering enhancements and performance updates.
Various other fixes and performance enhancements.
Various other fixes and performance enhancements.

There’s a new look for McCafé® Rewards, but the perk stays the same! Buy 5 any size McCafé® drinks, get 1 free. Valid thru 09/01/2019 at part. McD’s.
Updated the restaurant locator. We're providing even more information for the locations you love.
Enhanced menu item customization within Mobile Order & Pay.
Various other fixes and performance enhancements.

There’s a new look for McCafé® Rewards, but the perk stays the same! Buy 5 any size McCafé® drinks, get 1 free. Valid thru 09/01/2019 at part. McD’s.
Updated the restaurant locator. We're providing even more information for the locations you love.
Enhanced menu item customization within Mobile Order & Pay.
Various other fixes and performance enhancements.

There’s a new look & feel for the App you already love.
Jump to what you’re after, faster with a redesigned bottom nav bar.
The app refreshes with deals frequently! Find your favorite and have it ready to scan or add to your mobile order.
The App will now notify you when a menu item isn’t available.
Various other fixes and enhancements for a better overall experience.

• Order ahead and pick up at any participating McDonald’s with an improved Mobile Order & Pay experience
• Adding deals to Mobile Order & Pay is even easier
• Various other payment fixes and performance enhancements

We’ve redesigned the home screen. Enjoy the new look & feel for the App you already love.
Streamlined the Mobile Order & Pay check-in process when ordering in restaurant. Now you can order your favorites even faster!

• Improvements to Mobile Order & Pay check-in process
• Various other performance enhancements

• Improvements to Mobile Order & Pay check-in process
• Various other performance enhancements

What’s New:
•Improvements to the check-in process for Mobile Order and Pay.
•Map now provides more restaurant details and hours of operation.
•Enhancements made to the Mobile Ordering menu interface.

What’s New:
Easier access to Favorites.

What's new:
Various fixes and performance enhancements for a better overall experience.

Now you can order even faster! We've made it easier to access your favorites & recent orders.
Various visual updates made throughout the App.

Even easier check in for Mobile Order and Pay
Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements
Enhancements to Mobile Order and Pay, including easier check-in.

Enhancements to Mobile Order and Pay, including easier check-in and the ability to add condiments to your order.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

You can now add condiments to Mobile Order & Pay. Enjoy dipping your fries in any sauce you like!
Want to re-order one of your favorites? Expedited ordering has been re-enabled.
Various other fixes and enhancements for a better overall experience.

Introducing Siri Shortcuts. Add your order to Siri and reorder faster with voice command.
Updates to registration (now with Apple Sign In), account and Mobile Order & Pay — the smartest way to get your favorites.
Coming soon: Help Center, the place to find answers to your questions about the App, your account, McCafé Rewards and more.
Visit www.mcdonalds.com/ccpa-rights-center URL link for Do Not Sell.

Coming soon: many love their routines, so Siri will start to remind you to place your order to help you keep up with yours.
We've enhanced the experience when logging in from a new device to help you better protect your account information.
Other improvements to your experience include various bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Other improvements to your experience include various bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Not signed in? Not to worry. We now have guest browsing so you can look at the menu whenever you need to. Register or login later when you’re ready to order.
We’ve made the ordering process easier to view, simpler to customize and just a bit better when it comes to choosing sides and drinks for your meal. Other various bug fixes and enhancements.

We’ve updated messaging to make picking up your order even easier.
